original_text: After travelling for some time, we could see the island called Cyprus. We went south of Cyprus, and we continued as far as Syria. We arrived on the coast at the city of Tyre and we got off the ship. The ship would remain in Tyre for some days, because people had to remove the things off the ship.
korean_text: 구브로를 바라보고 이를 왼편에 두고 수리아로 항해하여 두로에서 상륙하니 거기서 배의 짐을 풀려 함이러라

sentences.original_text: we could see the island called Cyprus
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 키프로스라고 불리는 섬을 볼 수 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: and we continued as far as Syria
We arrived on the coast at the city of Tyre
and we got off the ship
The ship would remain in Tyre for some days
sentences.korean_translation: 배는 며칠 동안 티레에 머물 예정이었습니다

sentences.original_text: because people had to remove the things off the ship
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 배에서 물건들을 내려야 했기 때문입니다
